sentences.english: The letter added that counselling had been arranged for pupils and staff.
sentences.chinese: 信中说，已为学生和教职员工安排了心理咨询。

sentences.english: On behalf of the staff at Canada Weifang Secondary School (CWSS), we would like to welcome you.
sentences.chinese: 代表中加班的教职员工，我们对您表示衷心地欢迎。

sentences.english: He spoke on behalf of all the members of the faculty and staff.
sentences.chinese: 他代表全体教职员工讲了话。

sentences.english: Students and faculty crowded every inch of the auditorium .
sentences.chinese: 学生和教职员把大礼堂挤得水泄不通。

sentences.english: Special consideration may be extended to students with recommendation from wardens, Dean of Students or academic staff.
sentences.chinese: 舍监，辅导长或教职员推荐，另作特殊情况考虑。

sentences.english: Every faculty and staff member is entitled to one complimentary ticket.
sentences.chinese: 教职员有免费票一张，请自行或找人代至售票处领取。

sentences.english: The staff appraisal system including assessment criteria and procedures is clear.
sentences.chinese: 教职员考绩制度，包括评估准则和程序均清楚。

sentences.english: Student and staff figures are in headcounts and include all funding sources.
sentences.chinese: 学生及教职员总人数包括所有资助来源。

sentences.english: The service is restricted to students and staff of the Institute.
sentences.chinese: 服务只供教院学生及教职员使用。

sentences.english: For staff and alumni, please send the completed reply slip.
sentences.chinese: 逸夫书院教职员及校友请填妥报名表格报名。

sentences.english: All UM staff and full-time students are eligible to participate.
sentences.chinese: 所有澳门大学教职员和全职学生均可参加。

sentences.english: The Microcomputer Lab is for students, faculty and staff.
sentences.chinese: 该微电脑实验室是给学生和教职员工使用的。

sentences.english: The staff professional development plan meets my personal development needs.
sentences.chinese: 教职员专业发展计划配合我的发展需要。

sentences.english: Schools in Hong Kong are seriously under- staffed.
sentences.chinese: 本港学校教职员工严重不足。

sentences.english: Paul appeared before the faculty to account for his various misdemeanours.
sentences.chinese: 保罗在全体教职员面前解释了他的种种不端行为。

sentences.english: Seventeen alumni and 14 non-alumni faculty have won the Nobel Prize.
sentences.chinese: 十七校友及14个非校友教职员工共获得过诺贝尔奖。

definition: the school (as a party in a contract, dispute etc)/the school authorities
to give classes/to work as a teacher
full-time/to appoint sb to a specific task
